inputs.name: expectedVolume
inputs.description: The approximate volume of the object, in mL.

inputs.name: intensityHomogeneity
inputs.description: What is the homogeneity of intensity within the object? Given constant intensity at 1.0 score and extreme fluctuating intensity at 0.

inputs.name: curvatureWeight
inputs.description: Given sphere 1.0 score and extreme rough bounday/surface 0 score, what is the expected smoothness of the object?

inputs.name: labelValue
inputs.description: Label value of the output image

inputs.name: maxRunningTime
inputs.description: The program will stop if this time is reached.

name: Robust Statistics Segmenter
command-line: is there some prefix here? RobustStatisticsSegmenter #expectedVolume# #intensityHomogeneity# #curvatureWeight# #labelValue# #maxRunningTime# -- #originalImageFileName# #labelImageFileName# #segmentedImageFileName#
description: Active contour segmentation using robust statistic.
label: Robust Statistics Segmenter
